title: Relates to the farmworkers fair labor practices act
summary: Relates to the Farmworkers' Fair Labor Practices Act, includiung farm laborers within provisions pertaining to overtime compensation and unemployment insurance, granting collective bargaining rights to certain farm laborers, regulates the farm employment of certain employees, relates to the application of the sanitary code to farm and food processing labor camps for migrant workers and relates to the eligibility of farm laborers for disability benefits.
